pr_title: Prepare JSON template classes for new manifest cache design

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to persist a V21 manifest? Don't we do conversions of this to V22?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText:
We don't actually do a JSON-to-JSON conversion. We are currently persisting V21ManifestTemplate in the cache.
It's just that we can properly instantiate a Java Image instance from both V21 and V22.
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText:
It seems strange that we would generate a JsonTemplate type from separately parsed out jsonTemplates? Is this something that we would need to change eventually?
Can we go directly to ManifestAndConfigTemplate directly from file?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: In the next PR, all of these parsing and conversion operations will be gone, and this retrieveMetadata() will directly de-serialize and return ImageMetadataTemplate without any processing.
replies.author: chanseokoh
